channel.title: Vices on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Vices on Silence Speaks

item.title: Quarter-Life Crisis
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: There's nothing better Than a quarter-life crisis. At the peak of your prime, Catching up on lost time, Fighting off vicious vices By keeping yourself busy And taking in all of the city Without a care For what its price is. So long as you're no longer Left to your own devices.
